title: Saving Private Window Tabs when restarting
content: Due mostly to upgrades in the app software, it's necessary to restart Firefox on occasion. Also, it's necessary due to OS upgrades. While the Restore Previous Session is a wonderful feature, it arbitrarily (and properly, by default) forgets all of the Private Tabs. But, there are times when I'd like to save some or all of the Private Tabs I've got open. A 'settable' feature to 'Remember Private Tabs during Restart' would be a tremendous asset at times.
creator: antiquetuck

title: Rename Tab feature does not work in Private Window
content: I LOVE the Rename Tab feature in Firefox. But it doesn't appear to be accessible/work in Private Windows. Frankly, there are more Private Window tabs that I'd like to rename than regular window tabs. Help, please.

title: Firefox Update Option is Being Ignored
content:
I have the settings option for updates set to notify me and let me decide if I want to install.

So, imagine my surprise when I discovered today that Firefox has updated my browser without notifying me and without my permission.

No, this is not my imagination. I have a very distinct process to installing updates so it is very easy to tell that the browser has been updated without my permission.

Who should I complain to?

title: Something about my settings isn't allowing my school's VPN to connect.
content:
I went to IT at school because the VPN wasn't working. The VPN we need to access all school resources uses the device's default browser to do whatever it does. The IT guy said my issue probably had something to do with the VPN detecting saved passwords for the school and seeing that as a security threat. The temporary solution was to switch my default browser, but I hate both chrome and edge.

What do I need to change about my firefox settings to avoid the conflict with the VPN? I don't want to clear all my passwords; is that necessary?
